labels.rationale: Students debating rather than waiting for 'right' answers reflects her valuing independent thought (Self-Direction +1). Topic of coastal development project shows environmental education focus (Universalism +1). Clear reflection on why she chose this teaching path.

Nodded and said she'd 'think about it' when principal suggested toning down activism - surrendered autonomy in the moment (Self-Direction -1). Restrained her response to avoid confrontation (Conformity +1). Still tried to explain ocean pollution's relevance to Kerala, advocating environmental awareness (Universalism +1).

Considering 'softening approach' represents compromise of autonomous teaching style (Self-Direction -1). Strategic approach of not raising red flags shows conforming to institutional expectations (Conformity +1). Reasoning about not getting 'pushed out' reflects prioritizing stability (Security +1). Core concern remains students learning about their coastline (Universalism +1).
